name: Pango (itch) (Pepperfaced)
description:
The Great Pango Tree Needs Help!

In order to endure, Pango needs to sprout clone trees through its extensive root system. But local beavers keep eating the saplings! It's up to Spademan, the park ranger, to fend them off and help The Great Pango Tree propagate!

Controls

Move: WASD or arrow keys

Use shovel (for digging & attacking): E

Encourage sprout: hold space

____________________________________________

Game Design: Pepperfaced

Pixel Art: Sage, Pepperfaced

Concept Art & Cover Art: RascallyOr3o

Music: Giuliano Bertetti

The Guy Who Happened To Be There: Aaron
